text.headline:
Vortex Online Wind Modeling for Professionals. By Professional
2005 - 2015
text.text: Vortex started its technology development in 2005 by former Wind&Site engineers (with more than 20 years of experience, then), atmospheric physicists and computer experts in a unusual collaborative team of experienced professionals with active researchers.

text.headline: Vorex Foundation
text.text: Born in Barcelona on September 19t, 2005, Vortex started its technology development by former Wind&Site engineers (with more than 20 years of experience, then), atmospheric physicists and computer experts in a unusual collaborative team of experienced professionals with active researchers
